item.title: New Category : Player
item.content:encoded:
I've added a new category, "player", so that people can setup a Wiki page for their character. There's a template in place to make it easier to setup your stat card and portrait. I've also set the category so that only the person who created the page can edit the page after that (to stop vandalism from happening on people's pages).

I'll create a "Players" link on the left side, with a list of all players who have pages (possibly sorted by Village), and with instructions on how to create your player page.

Also, I'm going to open this one up to anyone with a Wikidot account, so they don't have to wait on an administrator for approval to make the page.

If you want an example of what I'm talking about, here's a version of my page: Uzuki.
